config-list: List of available options: %{text}More info at %{link}
internal-error: Oops, an internal error occurred. Please contact our support if the problem persists
need-manage-server: You need the "Manage server" permission to execute this command.
not-found: The server %{guild} has not yet been registered in the database

reset-all.confirmation: Are you sure you really want to reset everything? There will be no going back.
reset-all.success: All your configuration has been reset!
reset-all.error: Oops, something went wrong! Please contact our support if the problem persists

set_error.CATEGORY_INVALID: You have to provide a valid category for this option
set_error.channels_list: You have to provide between %{min} and %{max} channels for this option
set_error.CHANNEL_ANNOUNCEMENT: Announcement channels are not accepted for this option
set_error.CHANNEL_NON_NSFW: The channel for this option must be a NSFW channel
set_error.CHANNEL_NOT_TEXT: You have to provide a text channel for this option
set_error.CHANNEL_NOT_VOICE: You have to provide a voice channel for this option
set_error.CHANNEL_STAGE: Stage channels are not accepted for this option
set_error.CHANNEL_THREAD: The value of this option cannot be a thread channel
set_error.COLOR_INVALID: You have to provide a valid color for this option
set_error.emojis_list: You have to provide between %{min} and %{max} emojis for this option
set_error.emojis_list_exact: You have to provide exactly %{count} emojis for this option
set_error.EMOJI_INVALID: One of the provided emojis is invalid
set_error.ENUM_INVALID: The value must be one of the following: %{list}
set_error.float_err: The value must be a number between %{min} and %{max}
set_error.int_err: The value must be an integer between %{min} and %{max}
set_error.LEVELUP_CHANNEL_INVALID: The levelup channel must be either a text channel or the value 'any' or 'none'
set_error.roles_list: You have to provide between %{min} and %{max} roles
set_error.ROLE_EVERYONE: You cannot use the @everyone role for this option
set_error.ROLE_INTEGRATED: You cannot use an integrated role for this option
set_error.text_err: The text of this option must be between %{min} and %{max} characters long

set_success.enum: The %{opt} option has been set to %{val}
set_success.text: The text option %{opt} has been set to "%{val}"
set_success.role: The %{opt} option has been set to the role %{val}
set_success.roles_list: The %{opt} option has been set to the roles %{val}
set_success.text_channel: The %{opt} option has been set to the channel %{val}
set_success.text_channels_list: The %{opt} option has been set to the channels %{val}
set_success.voice_channel: The %{opt} option has been set to the voice channel %{val}
set_success.category: The '%{opt}' option has been set to the "%{val}" category
set_success.emojis_list: The %{opt} option has been set to the emojis %{val}

levelup_channel.any: Levelup messages will now be posted directly in the chat
levelup_channel.channel: Levelup messages will now be sent to %{val}
levelup_channel.none: Levelup messages won't be sent anymore
levelup_channel.dm: Levelup messages will be sent in users' Direct Messages

server_desc.anti_caps_lock: Should I send a message when a member sends too many capital letters? %{value}
server_desc.anti_scam: Should I check for malicious messages and delete them? %{value}
server_desc.autoremove_xp: Experience points removed daily from inactive members: %{value}
server_desc.ban_allowed_roles: List of roles that can use the command "ban": %{value}
server_desc.bot_news: List of channels where to send bot news: %{value}
server_desc.clear_allowed_roles: List of roles that can use the "clear" command: %{value}
server_desc.compress_help: Should the display of the `help` command be compressed? %{value}
server_desc.delete_welcome_on_quick_leave: Should I delete the welcome message when a member leaves right after joining? %{value}
server_desc.enable_fun: Are the commands listed in the `fun` command enabled? %{value}
server_desc.enable_xp: Should the xp system be enabled? %{value}
server_desc.help_in_dm: Send help message in private message? %{value}
server_desc.hunter: List of all chat rooms in which the game *Hunter* is active: %{value}
server_desc.kick_allowed_roles: List of roles that can use the "kick" command: %{value}
server_desc.language: Current bot language for this server: **%{value}**
server_desc.leave: Message sent when a member leaves: %{value}
server_desc.levelup_channel: Channel where levelup messages are sent: %{value}
server_desc.levelup_msg: Message sent when a member earns an xp level: %{value}
server_desc.membercounter: Channel displaying your member count in its name: %{value}
server_desc.mute_allowed_roles: List of roles that can use the "mute" command: %{value}
server_desc.nicknames_history: Should I remember nickname changes in this server? %{value}
server_desc.noxp_channels: Channels where you can't get xp: %{value}
server_desc.poll_channels: List of channels where :thumbsup: and :thumbsdown: reactions will be automatically added to each message: %{value}
server_desc.rank_in_dm: Send rank cards in private messages? %{value}
server_desc.save_roles: Should roles be saved when a member leaves, in case they returns? %{value}
server_desc.say_allowed_roles: List of roles that can use the command "say" : %{value}
server_desc.slowmode_allowed_roles: List of roles that can use "slowmode" and "freeze" commands: %{value}
server_desc.streaming_channel: Channel where to send live notifications: %{value}
server_desc.stream_mention: Role to mention when a member starts a live: %{value}
server_desc.streaming_role: Role given to whitelisted members who are streaming: %{value}
server_desc.update_mentions: Roles mentioned in the bot changelog: %{value}
server_desc.verification_role: Roles removed when a user use the `verify` command: %{value}
server_desc.voice_category: Category in which automatic voice chat rooms will be created: %{value}
server_desc.voice_channel: Channel from which automatic voice chat rooms will be created: %{value}
server_desc.voice_channel_format: Format of automatic voice channel names: %{value}
server_desc.voice_roles: Roles given to members in a vocal channel: %{value}
server_desc.warn_allowed_roles: List of roles that can use commands "warn" and "cases": %{value}
server_desc.welcome: Message sent when a member arrives: %{value}
server_desc.welcome_channel: List of channels where to send welcome/leave messages: %{value}
server_desc.welcome_roles: List of roles automatically given to new members: %{value}

tips.antiscam_enable_logs: You can enable logs for the antiscam system with the command %{modlogs_enable}
tips.title: Pro tip

value-deleted: The "%{option}" option value has been reset to its default value

warnings.antiraid_kick_ban: I need both 'Kick members' and 'Ban members' permissions to apply the anti-raid protection
warnings.antiraid_kick: I need the 'Kick members' permission to apply the anti-raid protection
warnings.antiraid_ban: I need the 'Ban members' permission to apply the anti-raid protection
warnings.channel_write_permissions: I need to be able to send messages in %{channel} for this option
warnings.moderation_command: I need the '%{perm}' permission to apply this command
warnings.title: Warning
warnings.xp_should_be_local: This option only works for local XP system. You can change the server XP system with the 'xp_type' configuration option
